about_the_game: Rev up your TRON RUN/r game with this turbocharged bundle! This exciting add-on features 9 new levels of CYCLE mode, 4 new STREAM track elements, 4 new characters: Classic Ram, Classic Crom, Legacy Gem, and the all-new Vector, plus 3 new cycles: a 1st Generation, Flynn’s 2nd Generation, and the all-new Vector Light Cycle.
detailed_description: Rev up your TRON RUN/r game with this turbocharged bundle! This exciting add-on features 9 new levels of CYCLE mode, 4 new STREAM track elements, 4 new characters: Classic Ram, Classic Crom, Legacy Gem, and the all-new Vector, plus 3 new cycles: a 1st Generation, Flynn’s 2nd Generation, and the all-new Vector Light Cycle.
